title: Diver

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You have a passive called "Depth". You start at 0 Depth, and can go all the way down to 10 Depth.
- At night, you passively go down by 1 Depth for each player who visits you, or 3 Depth if no player visits you.
- At night, choose to Struggle, attacking all players who visit you. If you Struggle below 5 or more Depth, you drown, dying immediately. (*If you are at 4 Depth at the start of the night and a player would visit you while Struggling, you will drown, because their visit causes your Depth to become 5 the night you struggle.*)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If the Depth becomes 10, the conclusion becomes "*The protagonist is sentenced to death far after the war's end. An anchor is chained to their leg, and they begin to fall to the sea's floor, where the suffocating fight to breathe is replaced by the cold embrace of darkness.*" When the story is completed with this conclusion, all non-Storytellers are blackmailed tomorrow, can't talk in night chats the night afterwards, and lose one stage of defense for the night.
